Package src.game

Class Summary
Battles This class will control fighting between 2 people in the world.
CitySpawns This class will keep track of the type of enemies that can spawn at each city.
DungeonSpawns A Singleton class that keeps track of what kind of monsters can spawn at different levels of dungeons.
DungeonView Class to communicate with the GameWorld to see which land objects are within view of the player while he is in a dungeon.
Enemy This is the class for enemy objects in the world.
EnemyMovement This class will perform movement on specified enemies.
GameWorld Singleton class.
Item Keeps track of items in the world.
Messages Singleton class used for sending messages to the gui and displaying them.
NPC This will keep track of NPC objects in the world.
OutsideView Class that controls what is to be drawn to the main GUI window when the player is outside, not looking at the map.
Player Class to keep track of a player in the world.
ShopkeeperSpawns This class keeps track of the shopkeeper that will spawn in each city.
SoundThread A thread to deal with Sounds.
TheEditor Runnable class that runs the editor.
TheGame This is a singleton class that actually runs the game.
Vehicle This class keeps track of the vehicle objects in the world.
